title: Drawing, "Classical Temple in a Landscape", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Temple structure seen from backside. Stands upon base and has window at its long side, pilasters at corners.  Surrounded by pavement with upright stones in corners. Middle distance, desk and two figures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Classical Temple in a Landscape", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2441.
